title: Hour 2: Deshaun Decision
description:
In this episode, Ryan Clark, Channing Crowder, and Fred Taylor continue to react to breaking news as Deshaun Watson has been handed a 6-game suspension for violating the NFL's personal conduct policy. Joining the discussions are Browns Reporter Jake Trotter, Dan Orlovsky, Kimberly A. Martin, and Angela Rye.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Reaction to Deshaun Watson's 6-game suspension
